text: "Downhearted" is a 1980 song by Australian band Australian Crawl. It was taken from their debut studio album The Boys Light Up. It went to number 12 in Australia and number 25 in New Zealand. It was covered by John Farnham for his 2005 album "I Remember When I Was Young". ==Track listing== #"Downhearted" (Sean Higgins, Guy McDonough, Bill McDonough) – 3:09 #"Way I've Been" (Brad Robinson, James Robinson) – 2:17 ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Australian Crawl songs Category:John Farnham songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Downhearted
